Now<S>1161</S> about<S>2596</S> that<S>1565</S> time<S>2540</S> Herod<S>2264</S> the king<S>935</S> stretched forth<S>1911</S> his hands<S>5495</S> to vex<S>2559</S> certain<S>5100</S> of<S>575</S> the church<S>1577</S>. <sup>stretched: or, began</sup>
And<S>1161</S> he killed<S>337</S> James<S>2385</S> the brother<S>80</S> of John<S>2491</S> with the sword<S>3162</S>.
And<S>2532</S> because he saw<S>1492</S> it<S>3754</S> pleased<S>2076</S> <S>701</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>, he proceeded further<S>4369</S> to take<S>4815</S> Peter<S>4074</S> also<S>2532</S>. (Then<S>1161</S> were<S>2258</S> the days<S>2250</S> of unleavened bread<S>106</S>.)
And<S>3739</S> <S>2532</S> when he had apprehended<S>4084</S> him, he put<S>5087</S> him in<S>1519</S> prison<S>5438</S>, and delivered<S>3860</S> him to four<S>5064</S> quaternions<S>5069</S> of soldiers<S>4757</S> to keep<S>5442</S> him<S>846</S>; intending<S>1014</S> after<S>3326</S> Easter<S>3957</S> to bring<S>321</S> him<S>846</S> forth<S>321</S> to the people<S>2992</S>. <sup>Easter: Gr. Passover</sup> <sup>quaternions: a file of four soldiers</sup>
Peter<S>4074</S> <S>3303</S> therefore<S>3767</S> was kept<S>5083</S> in<S>1722</S> prison<S>5438</S>: but<S>1161</S> prayer<S>4335</S> was<S>2258</S> made<S>1096</S> without ceasing<S>1618</S> of<S>5259</S> the church<S>1577</S> unto<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S> for<S>5228</S> him<S>846</S>. <sup>prayer: or, instant and earnest prayer was made</sup>
And<S>1161</S> when<S>3753</S> Herod<S>2264</S> would<S>3195</S> have brought<S>4254</S> him<S>846</S> forth<S>4254</S>, the same<S>1565</S> night<S>3571</S> Peter<S>4074</S> was<S>2258</S> sleeping<S>2837</S> between<S>3342</S> two<S>1417</S> soldiers<S>4757</S>, bound<S>1210</S> with two<S>1417</S> chains<S>254</S>: and<S>5037</S> the keepers<S>5441</S> before<S>4253</S> the door<S>2374</S> kept<S>5083</S> the prison<S>5438</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, the angel<S>32</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> came upon<S>2186</S> him, and<S>2532</S> a light<S>5457</S> shined<S>2989</S> in<S>1722</S> the prison<S>3612</S>: and<S>1161</S> he smote<S>3960</S> Peter<S>4074</S> on the side<S>4125</S>, and raised<S>1453</S> him<S>846</S> up<S>1453</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Arise up<S>450</S> quickly<S>1722</S> <S>5034</S>. And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> chains<S>254</S> fell off<S>1601</S> from<S>1537</S> his hands<S>5495</S>.
And<S>5037</S> the angel<S>32</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Gird thyself<S>4024</S>, and<S>2532</S> bind on<S>5265</S> thy<S>4675</S> sandals<S>4547</S>. And<S>1161</S> so<S>3779</S> he did<S>4160</S>. And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Cast<S>4016</S> thy garment<S>2440</S> about<S>4016</S> thee<S>4675</S>, and<S>2532</S> follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he went out<S>1831</S>, and followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> wist<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>3754</S> it was<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S> which<S>3588</S> was done<S>1096</S> by<S>1223</S> the angel<S>32</S>; but<S>1161</S> thought<S>1380</S> he saw<S>991</S> a vision<S>3705</S>.
When<S>1161</S> they were past<S>1330</S> the first<S>4413</S> and<S>2532</S> the second<S>1208</S> ward<S>5438</S>, they came<S>2064</S> unto<S>1909</S> the iron<S>4603</S> gate<S>4439</S> that leadeth<S>5342</S> unto<S>1519</S> the city<S>4172</S>; which<S>3748</S> opened<S>455</S> to them<S>846</S> of his own accord<S>844</S>: and<S>2532</S> they went out<S>1831</S>, and passed on through<S>4281</S> one<S>3391</S> street<S>4505</S>; and<S>2532</S> forthwith<S>2112</S> the angel<S>32</S> departed<S>868</S> from<S>575</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when Peter<S>4074</S> was come<S>1096</S> to<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S>, he said<S>2036</S>, Now<S>3568</S> I know<S>1492</S> of a surety<S>230</S>, that<S>3754</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> hath sent<S>1821</S> his<S>846</S> angel<S>32</S>, and<S>2532</S> hath delivered<S>1807</S> me<S>3165</S> out of<S>1537</S> the hand<S>5495</S> of Herod<S>2264</S>, and<S>2532</S> from all<S>3956</S> the expectation<S>4329</S> of the people<S>2992</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>.
And<S>5037</S> when he had considered<S>4894</S> the thing, he came<S>2064</S> to<S>1909</S> the house<S>3614</S> of Mary<S>3137</S> the mother<S>3384</S> of John<S>2491</S>, whose surname was<S>1941</S> Mark<S>3138</S>; where<S>3757</S> many<S>2425</S> were<S>2258</S> gathered together<S>4867</S> praying<S>2532</S> <S>4336</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as Peter<S>4074</S> knocked at<S>2925</S> the door<S>2374</S> of the gate<S>4440</S>, a damsel<S>3814</S> came<S>4334</S> to hearken<S>5219</S>, named<S>3686</S> Rhoda<S>4498</S>. <sup>to hearken: or, to ask who was there</sup>
And<S>2532</S> when she knew<S>1921</S> Peter's<S>4074</S> voice<S>5456</S>, she opened<S>455</S> not<S>3756</S> the gate<S>4440</S> for<S>575</S> gladness<S>5479</S>, but<S>1161</S> ran in<S>1532</S>, and told how<S>518</S> Peter<S>4074</S> stood<S>2476</S> before<S>4253</S> the gate<S>4440</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> her<S>846</S>, Thou art mad<S>3105</S>. But<S>1161</S> she constantly affirmed<S>1340</S> that it was<S>2192</S> even so<S>3779</S>. Then<S>1161</S> said they<S>3004</S>, It is<S>2076</S> his<S>846</S> angel<S>32</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Peter<S>4074</S> continued<S>1961</S> knocking<S>2925</S>: and<S>1161</S> when they had opened<S>455</S> the door, and saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>,<S>2532</S> they were astonished<S>1839</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he, beckoning<S>2678</S> unto them<S>846</S> with the hand<S>5495</S> to hold their peace<S>4601</S>, declared<S>1334</S> unto them<S>846</S> how<S>4459</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> had brought<S>1806</S> him<S>846</S> out of<S>1537</S> the prison<S>5438</S>. And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S>, Go shew<S>518</S> these things<S>5023</S> unto James<S>2385</S>, and<S>2532</S> to the brethren<S>80</S>. And<S>2532</S> he departed<S>1831</S>, and went<S>4198</S> into<S>1519</S> another<S>2087</S> place<S>5117</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> as soon as it was<S>1096</S> day<S>2250</S>, there was<S>2258</S> no<S>3756</S> small<S>3641</S> stir<S>5017</S> among<S>1722</S> the soldiers<S>4757</S>, what<S>5101</S> <S>686</S> was become<S>1096</S> of Peter<S>4074</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>1934</S> Herod<S>2264</S> had sought for<S>1934</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> found him<S>2147</S> not<S>3361</S>, he examined<S>350</S> the keepers<S>5441</S>, and commanded<S>2753</S> that they should be put to death<S>520</S>. And<S>2532</S> he went down<S>2718</S> from<S>575</S> Judaea<S>2449</S> to<S>1519</S> Caesarea<S>2542</S>, and there abode<S>1304</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Herod<S>2264</S> was<S>2258</S> highly displeased<S>2371</S> with them of Tyre<S>5183</S> and<S>2532</S> Sidon<S>4606</S>: but<S>1161</S> they came<S>3918</S> with one accord<S>3661</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S>, having made<S>3982</S> Blastus<S>986</S> the king's<S>935</S> chamberlain<S>1909</S> <S>2846</S> their friend<S>3982</S>, desired<S>154</S> peace<S>1515</S>; because<S>1223</S> their<S>846</S> country<S>5561</S> was nourished<S>5142</S> by<S>575</S> the king's<S>937</S> country. <sup>was highly: or, bare an hostile mind, intending war</sup> <sup>the king's chamberlain: Gr. that was over the king's bedchamber</sup>
And<S>1161</S> upon a set<S>5002</S> day<S>2250</S> Herod<S>2264</S>, arrayed<S>1746</S> in royal<S>937</S> apparel<S>2066</S>, sat<S>2523</S> upon<S>1909</S> his throne<S>968</S>, and<S>2532</S> made an oration<S>1215</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the people<S>1218</S> gave a shout<S>2019</S>, saying, It is the voice<S>5456</S> of a god<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> of a man<S>444</S>.
And<S>1161</S> immediately<S>3916</S> the angel<S>32</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> smote<S>3960</S> him<S>846</S>, because<S>473</S> <S>3739</S> he gave<S>1325</S> not<S>3756</S> God<S>2316</S> the glory<S>1391</S>: and<S>2532</S> he was<S>1096</S> eaten of worms<S>4662</S>, and gave up the ghost<S>1634</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S> grew<S>837</S> and<S>2532</S> multiplied<S>4129</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Barnabas<S>921</S> and<S>2532</S> Saul<S>4569</S> returned<S>5290</S> from<S>1537</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, when they had fulfilled<S>4137</S> their ministry<S>1248</S>, and<S>2532</S> took with them<S>4838</S> John<S>2491</S>, whose surname was<S>1941</S> Mark<S>3138</S>. <sup>ministry: or, charge</sup>
